Hey ! thanx For The Movies ! Just 1 Question!!!
Will The Quality Be Good On A Lcd Computer Screen Of 18 Inches?

@r-0987: I bought LG Led LCD 23.5" few months ago and when I played my 272p for the first time - it was like someone has hit me  in the stomach. On my old monitor, CRT one, same encode looked  absolutely flawless. 
Then I done few things:
- Installed CoreAVC and DivX 1.0 Pro (I uploaded them in my "Recommended.Playback.for.Win" torrent)
- plugged HDMI cable instead of usual one (what, by my surprise, got further 15% (subjective) improvement alone, especially in terms of reducing the 'blockiness'
-in Controls of GraphicDrivers rise anti-aliasing and all advanced post-processing features to maximum
- ALWAYS watched from the proper watching distance (6-8 feet)

Now - everything looks fine.

Am I satisfied? NO. Cheapest plain CRT monitors (I had from 17-22" ones) are at least twice as good in terms of dynamic picture (not static, as plain text). I have both monitors connected, but not anyone has this ability.
